definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Please also note that the University may not entertain any request in future fot transfer of curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 是指香港大学不接受任何转专业的请求吗？

sentences.english: I am a graduate of Hong Kong University, and have in addition the M. A. degree from UCLA.
sentences.chinese: 本人毕业于香港大学，并在加州大学文学硕士学位。

sentences.english: He is also a Distinguished Professor -at-Large at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 同时，他也是中国香港大学的客座教授。

sentences.english: Asia's highest ranking came via University of Hong Kong (HKU), at No. 22.
sentences.chinese: 排名最高的亚洲大学为香港大学，名列第22位。

sentences.english: He stopped at the University of Hong Kong to drum up some help to sample chicken droppings in the market.
sentences.chinese: 他在香港大学寻求帮助收集市场的鸡粪样本。

sentences.english: He is currently director of the HKU Centenary History Project.
sentences.chinese: 目前是香港大学百年校史项目的负责人。

sentences.english: Huang Yunru, 19, went to the University of Hong Kong, the No 1 school in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 19岁的黄蕴如升入亚洲排名第一的香港大学。

sentences.english: Why don't you spank your children to enter the University of Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 你为不把你的孩子打到考进香港大学？

sentences.english: The University of Hong Kong stands out as the top ranked Asian school at 22.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲排名最佳的是香港大学，排名第22。

sentences.english: I attended St. Stephen School and Hong Kong University.
sentences.chinese: 我上过圣斯提芬中学和香港大学。

sentences.english: Ladies and Gentlemen, the University of Hong Kong had modest beginnings.
sentences.chinese: 各位来宾，香港大学创始于谦微。

sentences.english: Dr Petula Sik Ying Ho is an Associate Professor at the Faculty of Social Science of the University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 何式凝博士是香港大学社会科学学院副教授。

sentences.english: The Observatory Dome of the HKU Department of Physics.
sentences.chinese: 香港大学物理系天文台。

sentences.english: The tendency to stay at HKU will be higher.
sentences.chinese: 留在香港大学的倾向较大。

sentences.english: This is the website for Food and Nutritional Science, University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 这是香港大学动物学系食品与营养科学研究组的网站。

sentences.english: He was awarded Doctor of Social Sciences (honoris causa) degree by the University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陈博士获香港大学颁授名誉社会科学博士学位。

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Zhong1 wen2 Da4 xue2
Xiang1 gang3 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2

definition: Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists

pinyin: Xin1 jia1 po1 Guo2 li4 Da4 xue2
Nan2 yang2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
National Taiwan University/abbr. to 臺大|台大[Tai2 Da4]

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2

definition: Imperial College of Science, Technology and Medicine, London
pinyin: Di4 guo2 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4

definition: Fudan University, Shanghai, abbr. for 復旦大學|复旦大学[Fu4 dan4 Da4 xue2]
